title: Dominant strategies for Sparkle and Bright

content.question: The payoff matrix above shows the profits associated with the strategic decisions of two oligopoly firms, Bright Company and Sparkle Company. The first entries in each cell show the profits to Bright and the second the profits to Sparkle. What are the dominant strategies for Bright and Sparkle, respectively?

choices.label:
Bright
 Sparkle

Strategy 2
 No dominant strategy

Bright
 Sparkle

No dominant strategy
 Strategy 1

content.answer:
Bright
 Sparkle

No dominant strategy
 Strategy 1

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
